00038 _code_gen :: close()
00039                   {
00040                   int index=0;
00041                   while(index<option_cnt)
00042                         {
00043                         delete option_list[index];
00044                         index++;
00045                         }
00046                   fp.close();
00047                   return 1;
00048                   }

00060 void _code_gen :: findgroup(_form_def *obj)
00061                 {
00062                 int length,i;
00063                  length = obj->control_list.getsize();
00064                  i=0;
00065                 while(i<length)
00066                         {
00067                         control_handler=obj->control_list.getitem(i+1);
00068                         switch(control_handler->type)
00069                                 {
00070                                 case C_OPTION:
00071                                         int index=0;
00072                                         int flag=0;
00073                                         while(index<option_cnt)
00074                                                 {
00075                                                 if(strcmp(option_list[index],((f_option*)control_handler)->gpname) == 0)
00076                                                   {
00077                                                   flag=1;
00078                                                   break;
00079                                                   }
00080                                                 index++;
00081                                                 }
00082                                         if(!flag)
00083                                                 {
00084                                                 option_list[option_cnt] = new char[50];
00085                                                 strcpy(option_list[option_cnt],((f_option*)control_handler)->gpname);
00086                                                 option_cnt++;
00087                                                 }
00088                                 break;
00089                                 }
00090                         i++;
00091                         }
00092 
00093                 }
00094 _code_gen :: generate(_form_def *obj,int vir,int help,char *fn)

00097                   ishelp=help;
00098                   strcpy(funcname,fn);
00099                   findgroup(obj);
00100                   fp<<"\n #include \"gui/gui_clas.h\" \n";
00101                   fp<<"\n class _"<<obj->name<<":public cwin\n";
00102                   open_curly();
00103                   fp<<"   public :\n";
00104                   declare(obj);
00105 
00106                   constructor(obj);
00107                   handle_fns(obj);
00108                   fp<<"  };";
00109                   fp<<"   /* Main function*/ \n";
00110                   mainfn(obj);
00111                   return 1;
00112                   }

00189 _code_gen ::init_form(_form_def *obj)
00190         {
00191         fp<<"\n  /* Initializing cwin attribute(s) */\n";
00192         if(isvir)
00193                 {
00194                 fp<<"   x = "<<obj->virx<<";\n";
00195                 fp<<"   y = "<<obj->viry<<";\n";
00196                 }
00197         else
00198                 {
00199                 fp<<"   x = "<<obj->x<<";\n";
00200                 fp<<"   y = "<<obj->y<<";\n";
00201                 }

00203         fp<<"   height = "<<obj->ht<<";\n";
00204         fp<<"   strcpy(title,\""<<obj->title<<"\");\n";

00208 _code_gen::handle_fns(_form_def *obj)
00209         {
00210                 int i,length;
00211                 fp<<"\n  int handle_event_onclick(object *obj)\n";
00212                 open_curly();
00213                 if(ishelp)
00214                 {
00215                 fp<<"   /* the return values are UNLOAD_CWIN --> Unloads the window \n";
00216                 fp<<"                            CANCEL_CWIN -->   \"         \"  ;\n";
00217                 fp<<"                            but status is CANCEL_CWIN (wind->status) \n";
00218                 fp<<"                            OK         --> simply return (no action on window)*/\n";
00219                 }
00220                  length = obj->control_list.getsize();
00221                  i=0;
00222                 while(i<length)
00223                         {
00224                         control_handler=obj->control_list.getitem(i+1);
00225                         switch(control_handler->type)
00226                                 {
00227                             case C_BUTTON:
00228                                         fp<<"   if( obj == "<<((f_button*)control_handler)->name<<")\n";
00229                                         fp<<"      { ";
00230                                         fp<<"       /* Do Operations for onclick() of control "<<((f_button*)control_handler)->name<<"*/\n";
00231                                         fp<<"      return UNLOAD_CWIN;\n";
00232                                         fp<<"      }\n";
00233                             break;
00234 
00235                             
00236                             case C_CBOX:
00237                                         fp<<"   if( obj == "<<((f_cbox*)control_handler)->name<<")\n";
00238                                         fp<<"      { ";
00239                                         fp<<"       /* Do Operations for onclick() of control "<<((f_cbox*)control_handler)->name<<"*/\n";
00240                                         fp<<"      return OK;\n";
00241                                         fp<<"      }\n";
00242                             break;
00243 
00244                             case C_OPTION:
00245                                         fp<<"   if( obj == "<<((f_option*)control_handler)->name<<")\n";
00246                                         fp<<"      { ";
00247                                         fp<<"       /* Do Operations for onclick() of control "<<((f_option*)control_handler)->name<<"*/\n";
00248                                         fp<<"      return OK;\n";
00249                                         fp<<"      }\n";
00250                             break;
00251 
00252                                 }
00253                         i++;
00254                         }
00255                 close_curly();
00256                 fp<<"\n// Event handling ended ... \n";
00257                   return 1;
00258 
00259         }

00261 _code_gen::init_controls(_form_def *obj)
00262         {

00264         while(index<option_cnt)
00265                         {
00266                         fp<<option_list[index];
00267                         index++;

00271                         if(option_cnt)

00381         _code_gen :: mainfn(_form_def * obj )
00382                 {
00383                 fp<<"\n  int "<<funcname<<" () \n";
00384                 open_curly();
00385                //       fp<<"   gdriver.setdir(\"f:\\\\tc3\\\\bgi\\\\\");\n";
00386                 fp<<"   gdriver.init();\n";
00387                 fp<<"   gdriver.usepalette();\n";
00388                 fp<<"   _"<<obj->name<<" *"<<obj->name<<";\n";
00389                 fp<<"   "<<obj->name<<" = new _"<<obj->name<<";\n";
00390                 fp<<"   "<<obj->name<<"->run();\n";
00391                 fp<<"   delete "<<obj->name<<";\n";
00392                 fp<<"   gdriver.unload();\n";
00393                 fp<<"   return 0;\n";
00394                 close_curly();
00395                   return 1;
00396                 }
